sections.title: Building the Future of Web Development
sections.subtitle: We're a team of passionate developers, designers, and strategists helping businesses build faster, more flexible websites.

sections.title: Empowering Digital Transformation
sections.content: We believe every business deserves a powerful, flexible web presence. Our decoupled architecture combines the best of headless CMS with modern frontend frameworks to deliver exceptional digital experiences.

cards.title: Customer First
cards.description: Every decision starts with how it benefits our customers.

cards.title: Innovation
cards.description: We constantly push boundaries and embrace new technologies.

cards.title: Collaboration
cards.description: Great products are built by great teams working together.

sections.title: Ready to Transform Your Digital Presence?
sections.subtitle: Join thousands of teams building better websites with our platform.

sections.title: We'd Love to Hear From You
sections.subtitle: Have questions about our platform? Want to discuss a project? Our team is here to help.

items.question: What's the typical response time?
items.answer: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days.

items.question: Do you offer phone support?
items.answer: Phone support is available for Enterprise customers. All plans include email and chat support.

items.question: Can I schedule a product demo?
items.answer: Absolutely! Use the 'Book a Demo' option above to schedule a personalized walkthrough.

sections.title: Everything You Need to Build Amazing Websites
sections.subtitle: From content management to deployment, we've got you covered with a complete suite of tools.

cards.title: Decoupled Architecture
cards.description: Separate your content from presentation for maximum flexibility.

cards.title: Edge Deployment
cards.description: Deploy globally with sub-50ms response times.

cards.title: Developer Experience
cards.description: Modern tooling with TypeScript, React, and Next.js.

cards.title: Enterprise Security
cards.description: SOC 2 compliant with SSO and role-based access.

sections.title: Edit Content Like Never Before
sections.content: Our intuitive visual editor lets content teams work independently while developers focus on building features. No more bottlenecks.

sections.title: Choose the Plan That's Right for You
sections.subtitle: Start free and scale as you grow. No hidden fees, no surprises.

tiers.name: Starter
tiers.description: Perfect for personal projects and experimentation

tiers.name: Pro
tiers.description: For professional developers and small teams

items.question: Can I change plans later?
items.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Pro plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards and can arrange invoicing for Enterprise customers.
